author: Jon Brodkin
title: Charter has 230 infected employees after resisting work-at-home requests
description: NY attorney general opens inquiry into Charter labor practices during pandemic.
content:
Enlarge/ A Charter Spectrum vehicle.
7 with 7 posters participating
More than 230 Charter employees have tested positive for COVID-19, and at least two have died, The New York Times reported today.
New York Attorney General Letitia James' office has opened… [+3335 chars]
